channel.description: Recent content in browsers on Reflections

item.title: Which browser cares about privacy the most?
item.description: I stopped using Chrome a long time ago due to privacy concerns, and I’ve been switching between Firefox, Edge, and occasionally Brave. But I never spent the time to fully compare these browsers and analyze which one best suits my needs. Today, I decided to look deeply into these browsers and ended up going down a rabbit hole of researching their privacy features. Why is this important? Every time we browse a website, we are sharing bits of our digital life with companies we don’t know.
